get.description: Lists all of the available Azure Video Indexer provider operations.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

operation.description: Localized friendly name for the operation

description.description: Localized friendly description for the operation

value.description: List of operations supported by the Resource Provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

post.description: Checks that the Video Indexer account name is valid and is not already in use.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

parameters.name: checkNameAvailabilityParameters

type.description: The type of resource, Microsoft.VideoIndexer/accounts

schema.description: The parameters used to check the availability of the Video Indexer account name.

parameters.description: The name of the Video Indexer account. Name must be unique globally

200.description: OK - Operation to check the Video Indexer account name availability was successful. Ok does not indicate the name is available, the body of the response does.

nameAvailable.description: Gets a boolean value that indicates whether the name is available for you to use. If true, the name is available. If false, the name has already been taken.

reason.description: Gets the reason that a Video Indexer account name could not be used. The Reason element is only returned if NameAvailable is false.

message.description: Gets an error message explaining the Reason value in more detail.

get.description: List all Azure Video Indexer accounts available under the subscription

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription. The value must be an UUID.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

accountId.description: The account's data-plane ID. This can be set only when connecting an existing classic account

userAssignedIdentity.description: The user assigned identity to be used to grant permissions
The user assigned identity to be used to grant permissions

totalSecondsIndexed.description: An integer representing the total seconds that have been indexed on the account

totalMinutesIndexed.description: An integer representing the total minutes that have been indexed on the account

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for the account.

privateEndpointConnections.description: List of private endpoint connections associated with the account.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

groupIds.description: The group ids for the private endpoint resource.

id.description: The ARM identifier for private endpoint.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the private endpoint connection resource.
Gets the status of the account at the time the operation was called.

identity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

principalId.description: The service principal ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.title: User-Assigned Identities
userAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

principalId.description: The principal ID of the assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client ID of the assigned identity.

value.description: List of accounts and their properties.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

schema.description: The list operation response, that contains the data pools and their properties.

AccountCheckNameAvailabilityParameters.description: The parameters used to check the availability of the Video Indexer account name.

nameAvailable.description: Gets a boolean value that indicates whether the name is available for you to use. If true, the name is available. If false, the name has already been taken.

reason.description: Gets the reason that a Video Indexer account name could not be used. The Reason element is only returned if NameAvailable is false.

message.description: Gets an error message explaining the Reason value in more detail.
